text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days after first hearing the<n>rumors about Tosen
Jordan, I happen<n>to see her as I pass by the school<n>gates.

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are, Jordan! The<n>teacher's looking for you!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I know. The school just hit me<n>up. I'm headed over
now.

text_block_list.name: Classmate
text_block_list.text: Well, you better hurry! She seemedreally angry... You can't skip classand practice. You might getkicked out, you know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yeah... I know.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Skipping class, not even showing up<n>for tests... All that could
be overlooked<n>if you were entering races, but you<n>won't
even train.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
What's going on here, Jordan? I<n>know you were injured,
but you never<n>let that affect you before... If you need<n>
someone to talk to, you know I'm<n>here for you.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I dunno. I'm just, like... low-key in a<n>slump, I guess?

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Please take this seriously... I'm<n>worried about you. Is it an
issue of<n>motivation?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I. Don't. Know. Period. End of story.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: Sigh... All right. Let's call thismeeting adjourned. For now, I'vemade a worksheet summarizing thisweek's lessons. Once you finish, youmay go.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
When you feel like racing again, you<n>know where to find
me.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
For real though, what was I supposed<n>to say? Even I don't
know what the<n>problem is.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Several hours after seeing her at the<n>gates, I'm walking
down the academy<n>corridors when I notice Tosen Jordan<n>
sitting in an empty room, struggling<n>with a worksheet.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: "Solve with a natural number,assuming the square root is also anatural number." What's that mean?Like, numbers in nature? What doesthat mean? Trees?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Ugh! This is straight up code! How am<n>I supposed to know
what to do? This<n>suuuucks!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She slams her head dramatically into<n>the desk. As she does,
the worksheet<n>in her hands gets caught on<n>something,
causing it to rip.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Great. Just... great. I am... so done.<n>Deceased.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
How's the homework coming<n>along—huh? Did you... rip up
your<n>worksheet?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah, well... I guess I did.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Well... you've made yourself clear. I<n>see you have no
intention of<n>improving yourself.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
But you MUST learn to use your<n>words! I can't believe you
would rip<n>up your worksheet just to prove a<n>point!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From what I saw, the worksheet<n>ripping was just an
unfortunate<n>accident. Of course, if she just<n>explains what
happened, I'm sure the<n>teacher will understand.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Whatever...

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text: I'm trying to help you, you know.But if you don't work with me, I can'tdo anything.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Have you really lost your drive? You<n>really want to stop
racing? Truly?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I don't know. How am I supposed to<n>know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But if that's how everyone sees it,<n>then it doesn't sound
that outta<n>pocket to me.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Instead of clearing her name, she<n>simply turns her back on
the teacher<n>and walks away. It's like she's<n>given up... I
decide to follow to make<n>sure she's okay.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When I finally catch up to her, I find<n>her carefully coating her
injured<n>toenail with strengthener. Other nail<n>care products
are laid out around her.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Stupid toenail. Stupidmedical care. Stupid Tickezo, alwayscrying whenever I treat it in our room,making me do it outside. It's all so...stupid.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: If it weren't for my stupid flimsy toe,<n>maybe I—ugh. Forget it.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She sounds exhausted, but from her<n>careful application, it's
clear she's<n>treating her injury as best she can.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't imagine someone who takes<n>such good care of
themselves would<n>want to stop racing.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: So why is she refusing to race?
choice_data_list: (I'd like to hear how she really feels.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I get my chance a few days later,<n>when I spot Tosen Jordan
skipping<n>class and wandering aimlessly<n>around town.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's an academy trainer<n>want with me?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Talk? Ah... Did the school put you up<n>to this? I'm sure
having a student<n>skipping classes and training is a big<n>
yikes for admin.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, but I've, like, lost my<n>motivation or whatever. Don't
waste<n>your time on me.
choice_data_list: I saw you taking care of your toe the other day.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: What?! Wait, when?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly apologize for not saying<n>anything at the time, but
explain that<n>I've wanted to speak with her since<n>then.
choice_data_list:
I can't shake the feeling that you still want to
race.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Uh... Because I was taking care of my<n>toenail? You've got it
all wrong. I just<n>feel weird if I don't treat it regularly.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You can't tell if I wanna run just fromthat. I mean, even I don't knowwhat my deal is.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
And, like, why's it any of your<n>business, anyway? I'm not
exactly<n>radiating main character energy over<n>here, so
what's the point?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Growl...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: I-ignore that! I just skipped breakfast,<n>okay?!
choice_data_list: How about we get something to eat?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Now you're trying to bribe mewith food?! I have some dignity,you know!
choice_data_list: We don't have to talk. We can just eat.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hm... Okay, bet. But only if we go tothat place and only if you'll let meeat as much as I want.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking at the place Jordan pointed<n>out, I find myself staring
at a flashy<n>fast food restaurant.
